Health360: Weight & Anti-Age

AI assistant for hormonal health and biological age optimization.

Summary
Health360: Weight & Anti-Age helps women over 30 improve weight, energy, and aging markers using low-GI nutrition, physiological literacy, and structured lifestyle guidance.

Technical context
Framework: React Native / Expo
Backend: Firebase Functions, Firestore
Vector search: Qdrant
AI models: OpenAI GPT-4 class, Gemini Vertex AI

Core philosophy
Anti-diet approach focused on blood sugar stability, hormonal balance, and long-term health.

URL
https://github.com/HealthyElegant/health360-weight-anti-age
